text: Kun pora Probhu ke morom nakore, tai uporte shrap thaki bole dibi. Amikhan laga Probhu. Ahibi16.22 Yunani bhasa te ‘Maranatha’ laga motlob ase ‘Amikhan laga Probhu, Ahibi!’ Aru Aramaic bhasa koi thaka Khristan khan pora etu prathana nisina choilai jaise. (‘Amen’, ‘Hosanna’ aru ‘Halleluyah’ kuwa nisina ase).!
